title: Quebecor Inc. (QBCRF) Q2 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
description: Quebecor Inc. (OTCPK:QBCRF) Q2 2025 Earnings Conference Call August 7, 2025 11:00 AM ETCompany ParticipantsHugues Simard - Chief Financial OfficerPierre...
content:
Quebecor Inc. (OTCPK:QBCRF) Q2 2025 Earnings Conference Call August 7, 2025 11:00 AM ET

David John McFadgen - Cormark Securities Inc., Research Division

 Drew McReynolds - RBC Capital Markets, Research Division

 Jerome Dubreuil - Desjardins Securities Inc., Research Division

 Maher Yaghi - Scotiabank Global Banking and Markets, Research Division

 Matthew Griffiths - BofA Securities, Research Division

 Stephanie Doris Price - CIBC Capital Markets, Research Division

 Vince Valentini - TD Cowen, Research Division

Good day, everyone, and thank you for standing by. Welcome to the Quebecor Inc.'s Financial Results for the Second Quarter 2025 Conference Call. I would like to introduce Hugues Simard, Chief Financial Officer of Quebecor Inc. Please go ahead.

Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to this Quebecor conference call. I'm Hugues Simard, and joining me to discuss our financial and operating results for the second quarter of 2025 is Pierre Karl Peladeau, our President and Chief Executive Officer. Anyone unable to attend the conference call will be able to access the recorded version by logging on to the webcast available on Quebecor's website until October 10 of this year.

As usual, I also want to inform you that certain statements made on the call today may be considered forward-looking, and we would refer you to the risk factors outlined in today's press release and reports filed by the corporation with the regulatory authorities.

I'll now turn the floor to Pierre Karl.

Good morning, everyone. So, I'm happy to report once again solid operational and financial results for Quebecor in this second quarter of 2025. We're continuing to deliver on our expansion plan quarter-after-quarter, growing our wireless market share across Canada, generating consistently strong cash flows and reducing our leverage to maintain
summary: Quebecor Inc. (QBCRF) is set to hold its Q2 2025 Earnings Conference Call on August 7, 2025. The company's Chief Financial Officer, Hugues Simard, will discuss the financial and operating results for the second quarter of 2025 alongside President and Chief Executive Officer Pierre Karl Peladeau. Anyone unable to attend the conference call can access the recorded version by logging onto the webcast available on Quebecor's website until October 10. Some statements made on the call may be considered forward-looking and refer to the risk factors outlined in the company's press release and reports filed with the regulatory authorities.
shortSummary: Quebecor Inc. Q2 2025 earnings call, featuring Hugues Simard, Pierre Karl Peladeau, and a recorded version, may contain forward-looking statements.
argos_summary: Quebecor Inc. reported solid operational and financial results for the second quarter of 2025 during their earnings conference call. CEO Pierre Karl Peladeau highlighted the company's continued expansion in the wireless market across Canada, strong cash flow generation, and efforts to reduce leverage. The call included forward-looking statements and emphasized the company's commitment to its growth strategy.
